textContent:
Living true to my values, along my intentions...

What would elder Aaron say?

Get clear on the conditions I need to heal. Get clear on the boundaries I need to set. Get clear and resolute on what I need and then build the pathway to it. 

Playing offense vs playing defense - leaving the trail of breadcrumbs

Intention vs expectation - because we don't know

I am not able to show up and love others in the way I want to love them, when I don't love myself and follow my own energy.
title: Life
textContentHtml:
Living true to my values, along my intentions...


What would elder Aaron say?


Get clear on the conditions I need to heal. Get clear on the boundaries I need to set. Get clear and resolute on what I need and then build the pathway to it. 


Playing offense vs playing defense - leaving the trail of breadcrumbs


Intention vs expectation - because we don't know


I am not able to show up and love others in the way I want to love them, when I don't love myself and follow my own energy.
